Welcome to SymPy’s documentation!

{{ _(This is the documentation for the latest SymPy documentation.) }}

SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics. The documentation details different aspects of the library, including a modules' reference, a tutotial for beginners and developer guidelines.
